title: BRIEF-Toronto-Dominion Bank Group Announces Increase To NVCC Preferred Share Issue
text: March 5, 2018 / 7:56 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Toronto-Dominion Bank Group Announces Increase To NVCC Preferred Share Issue Reuters Staff March 5 (Reuters) - Toronto-Dominion Bank: * TD BANK GROUP ANNOUNCES INCREASE TO NVCC PREFERRED SHARE ISSUE * TORONTO-DOMINION BANK - SIZE OF PUBLIC OFFERING OF NON-CUMULATIVE 5-YEAR RATE RESET PREFERRED SHARES, SERIES 18, BEEN INCREASED TO 14 MILLION SERIES 18 SHARES * TORONTO-DOMINION BANK - GROSS PROCEEDS OF OFFERING WILL NOW BE $350 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
